attributes.title: He’s just a bad president and this app made my phone glitch out a lot (don’t download)
attributes.review: When I first got the app my phone started glitching and lagging. My apps would be misplaced, it would kick me out of apps when I tried to go in. Horrible app. DONT DOWNLOAD IT AND RATE IT 1 STAR.

attributes.title: Glitchy and not working
attributes.review: I just want to see what the president is doing because I wasn’t sure if I’m going to vote for him again, but showing he did nothing and the app kept glitching I definitely won’t.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This kept shutting down my phone and it sucked it made my phone glitch I don’t ever want to see this again I almost broke my and my camera would turn on randomly

attributes.title: Trump hates people of color
attributes.review: And it’s not just people of color it’s anyone who’s not white nobody should vote for him again bad enough he was in office once and then he got impeached and there are so my less jobs the main part of his campaign was to make MORE jobs..PLEASE DON’T VOTE FOR TRUMP..PLEASE

attributes.title: Scary app!!!
attributes.review: Wow this app is absolutely terrifying. I just wanted to support my president when it asked for my mobile number. Why would it need a number? Not safe for me or my children. I’m sure others were scared of this app as well!

attributes.title: What was he expecting?
attributes.review: He really expected to win a battle with the generation born with technology. Yes, we use certain apps to assemble, and yes taking those away could wound us, but he didn’t seriously expect us to go quietly, right?

attributes.title: ✨🧚🏾‍♀️👑 WORST APP EVER✨🧚🏾‍♀️🌈
attributes.review:
One of the worst apps I have ever had the chance to experience. This app has a horrible design and lags constantly. Also for some reason, the app makes all my apps with any semblance of color completely stop working. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. 

0/10

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: the app is almost impossible to figure out. i could barely get past the tutorial. where’s level one? 😭😭😭😭😭also it gave me cancer like i have to go to st judes. at least i’m in the commercials now 😏👩🏻‍🦲

attributes.title: Um
attributes.review: If you’re looking at the state of our country right now and thinking “wow everything is fine and dandy” then I’m so sorry that you’re brain dead 💅 literally would rather vote for a pair of worn sneakers because it’s more educated than this Cheeto puff

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: trump is a racist, homophobic, transphobic, rapist. he does NOT deserve to be president. he should be put in jail for the rest of his life. i hope he loses everything. he’s also a cry baby who throws tantrums when he doesn’t get what he wants. someone just pull a john wilksbooth on him
